sub_title: Data Specialist at ARTIS | Natura Artis Magistra
summary:
I am an idealist and perfectionist, driven by purpose, service and growth. I aspire to contribute a better world, a world in which humankind, animals and nature can thrive and can interact and coexist in a sustainable harmony.

In my profile, you can read more about what I do, who I am and what developed me. Please get to know me better and do not hesitate to contact me.

projects.title: Running for Painted Dogs
projects.description:
In 2022, I'm running 2.022 kilometres to raise awareness and funds for the conservation of the African Painted Dog.

The African Painted Dog (also know as the African Wild Wolf or Lycaon Pictus) is a very endangered species living in Subsaharan Africa. Latest estimates are that there are less than 6,600 animals in the wild.

Full proceeds for this challenge will be donated to Painted Dog Conservation in Zimbabwe (through their branch in the Netherlands Stichting Painted Dog Conservation). Please find more information about PDC via https://www.painteddog.org/ and https://painteddogconservation.nl/)

If you want to support me, please send me a message here or an email to daleyvandesande@gmail.com.

contributors.headline: Data Specialist at ARTIS | Natura Artis Magistra

projects.title: Zoo & Wildlife Photography
projects.description:
During the Covid-19 pandemic, I strongly reconnected with nature and animals (both in the wild and in zoos). Having always fantasized about photography, I picked up my camera and started to explore the world of nature, animals and photography.

With my photos, I aspire to inspire my audience to see the beauty, resilience and uniqueness of nature and animals (at a macro- (nature and wildlife in general), meso- (different species), and microlevel (individual animals)) and spark their motivation to contribute to the conservation and protection of nature and wildlife.

projects.title: Changing role of assisting support by Quadrant Advies
projects.description: The aim of this research is to get insight in the important role assisting support plays within organization. Especially, focus is put on the role of assisting support in the restructuring process; what consequences it has for the position of the assisting staff and its tasks and responsibilities.

projects.title: Research ACP Investment Bank
projects.description: This research focuses on the establishment of an investment bank for the ACP region. On the one hand, it deals with the desirability and necessity of such a bank. On the other hand, it focuses on policy, financial mechanisms, and governance.

profile_positions.description:
At ARTIS we inspire and encourage a broad section of the public to treat nature in a responsible manner. 

We bring nature to life and share the stories from the very smallest (microbes) in ARTIS-Micropia, to the flora and fauna in ARTIS-Park and ARTIS-Aquarium to the very biggest scale in the ARTIS-Planetarium and how all of nature and life is connected in ARTIS-Groote Museum.

As data specialist I create a sustainable, data-driven foundation to engage as many people with ARTIS' mission. Today and in the future.
profile_positions.title: Data Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Strategically guide the Dutch National Board of the world's largest student-run organization
- Guiding the National Board of AIESEC the Netherlands on the development, results and continuity of the organization
- Coaching the Country Manager of the National Board of AIESEC the Netherlands on team management, personal growth, network management and strategy development & execution (Before I coached the National Director of Outgoing Exchange)
profile_positions.title: Chair of the Board of Directors

profile_positions.description: Riverwise is a strategy & business development consulting firm aimed at creating sustainable and profitable growth – both for large incumbents and new ventures. We have a deep understanding of the markets we work in (Financial Services, Media, Public & Health), and combine thorough analysis with creative and original thinking.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
President of the national board of AIESEC in The Netherlands. AIESEC is the world's largest youth-run NGO, which provides young people with opportunities to develop their leadership potential in an international environment through volunteering opportunities, internships and our membership.

I am responsible for managing and coaching the national team of 7 people from diverse cultural backgrounds, creating the process of strategy creation and alignment and ensure downscaling and implementation, safeguarding (strategic and financial) continuity, optimizing governance with our Board of Directors, and coaching the group of 11 local presidents that are responsible for our local offices and our 300+ members.

Being National President of an AIESEC Chapter also includes accountability and responsibility to the global organization, which I do by being part of the Global Finance Subcommittee - which functions as an internal audit committee for AIESEC International - and being Regional Chair of the European Network - with the objectives to optimize the alignment of the Regional Office for Europe with the national entities, to support the Regional Office in their financial management, and to foster cooperation within Europe.
profile_positions.title: President

profile_positions.description:
Member of the national board of AIESEC in Nicaragua. AIESEC is the world's largest youth-run NGO, which provides young people with opportunities to develop their leadership potential in an international environment through volunteering opportunities, internships and our membership.

I am the final responsible for creating, building and developing the talent capacity of AIESEC in Nicaragua (through recruitment, selection, education, training and coaching), exploring and implementing strategies to expand our organization (through creating growth models and strategies, opening new local offices and implementing new programs and products) and determining and securing the national direction.
profile_positions.title: National Director Talent Management & Organizational Development

profile_positions.description:
Member of the national board of AIESEC in The Netherlands and final responsible for AIESEC's Outgoing Global Volunteer (oGV) program in the Netherlands. 

The oGV program allows young people to develop their potential and make a positive impact ob local communities by volunteering abroad for 6-8 weeks.

I am responsible for determining and executing the strategic direction, partnership management, quality control and coaching and supporting the 11 local offices of AIESEC in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: National Director Outgoing Global Volunteer

profile_positions.description:
Full-time member of the Executive Board of AIESEC Tilburg and leader of the Outgoing Global Volunteer program (oGV) team. The oGV team selects, guides, supports and coaches students of Tilburg University throughout their volunteering experience abroad. AIESEC Tilburg is a local branch for one of the largest non-profit organizations in the world that aims to develop leadership within the youth.

I am responsible for motivating, supporting and managing the oGV team (8 people), reaching the set targets and goals, thinking strategically on how to improve the outgoing community development projects program and creating the local strategy for the team.
profile_positions.title: Local Director Outgoing Global Volunteer Program

profile_positions.description:
AIESEC is a global non-profit student organization that develops youth leadership. We believe that through developing the leadership potential of young people today, we create a positive impact on future society. We enable future leaders by finding out what their strengths, dreams and goals are in life and empower them to fulfill their potential.

I am responsible for the online and offline marketing and promotion activities of AIESEC's professional international internship program and selection and coaching of students at AIESEC Tilburg that want to gain international experience via a professional internship abroad.

Main learning points: online marketing, sales, external relations, creative thinking, marketing research, graphical design.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager Outgoing Internships

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for taking care of the elderly in this elderly home by providing breakfast and lunch and performing several other household activities.

This position helped me to learn about customer management and customer centricity, stakeholder management, planning & prioritizing and most importantly building a connection with the elderly and colleagues and learn from their life experience.
profile_positions.title: Facilities services

profile_positions.description:
Stichting Keygro is a non-profit organization founded and run by students of the Outreaching Honors Program. Stichting Keygro aims to develop the potential of people by offering professional and social competence trainings to (high school) students, providing board positions, giving students the opportunity to become a trainer and to give financial support to educational charities.

I determine and execute the overall strategy of the foundation, coordinate and track the strategy of the three teams (Acquisition & Account Management, Marketing & HR and Trainers & Training Development) and leading, coaching and guiding 9 members.

I am also responsible for giving workshops and assuring the quality of them.

Former responsibilities: Acquisition and Account Management: the acquisition of new high schools and customer relation management.

Main learning points: entrepreneurial and strategic thinking, planning, coaching, sales, customer relation management, public speaking, training development and continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Chairman, Trainer and Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
I perform the internal auditing, documentation and administration for Project "Afkoopwaarden". Through this internship, I gained better understanding in analyzing and documenting processes, interviewing employees and process management.

Main learning points: interviewing, critical thinking, analytics.
profile_positions.title: Internship

volunteer_experiences.description:
I was a volunteer in the two communities of Cooperativa EOS Sociale Onlus in Trieste to support 26 MSNA (Minori Stranieri Non Accompagnati - unaccompanied foreign minors).

My tasks included assisting and supporting in the day-to-day activities (such as cooking, household activities and Italian language education) and creating and delivering a series of workshops to increase the minors' self-awareness and cross-cultural understanding and capabilities.

volunteer_experiences.role: Voluntary Summer Project | World Without Borders Summer Camps in Lugansk, Ukraine
volunteer_experiences.description: Intern at Global Community Development Program "Summer Without Border Summer Camps" at AIESEC in Lugansk, Ukraine. I worked as a group leader in summer camps for Ukrainian children, gave presentations about the Netherlands and the Dutch culture to local citizens and organized speaking clubs for Ukrainians, AIESEC'ers and other international interns, which gave me understanding in intercultural communications and the international world we live in. I also attended the AIESEC Beach Conference 2012 in Odessa Ukraine contributing to developing leadership by discussing international experiences, the international context we live in and setting personal development goals.

As a buddy at I*ESN Tilburg, I am responsible for introducing a group of international master students studying at Tilburg University to the Netherlands, Tilburg and Tilburg University, supporting them throughout their masters in case of problems and organizing group activities.

As an active member, I have participated in the camp committee (organizing an introduction camp for about 200 participants), in the events committee (organizing day excursions and weekend trips for groups ranging from 25-100 people) and in the bar committee.

Via my active membership, I improved my intercultural communications and event management skills.
